authToken: make an application and a bot on https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me and get the client ID from there
authorDiscordId: put your discord ID (setings -> appearance -> developer mode, then right click your name in a chat and Copy ID) here
avatarUrl: put the URL of your bot's avatar image here
lockId: if you plan to run only one instance of your bot you can put whatever here
botNotConfigured: remove this when your bot is configured
